positions.title: Ericsson
positions.description:
Worked for OneFM, which is Ericsson’s Internal Fault Management tool based on IBM Tivoli Netcool suite of products. OneFM provides single platform to integrate EMS provided by different vendors and using different protocols.
• Developed automated test scripts from manual test cases based on the requirem...

positions.title: Web Development Intern
positions.description: During the internship I designed a web application called "Virtual Library" designed using WebGL and Three.js. The project aimed at creating a system to navigate in a library and also interacting with the 3D objects in the library.

positions.title: Intern (Android App Development)
positions.description: The objective of this internship was to develop an android app called "Blood for life" which searches blood donors based on the geographic proximity. Worked on the user interface development of this app.

educations.title: Mody University of Technology and Science

items: Performance Comparison between Hadoop single node cluster, multinode cluster and Spark
Color tracking of objects in real time
